name: Export Preview
description: Stage 9 — final stage. Preview the assembled SDP package, run cross-reference validation, and download the export. Shows the complete file tree with sizes and validation status.

components.name: SDPTreeView
components.description: File tree showing the complete SDP folder structure. Each file shows name, format badge (JSON/MD/SQL/YAML), estimated size, and validation status icon. Click a file to preview its contents.

components.name: FilePreview
components.description: Preview panel showing the selected file's contents with syntax highlighting. Supports JSON, Markdown rendered, SQL, and YAML.

components.name: ValidationResults
components.description: Validation panel showing cross-reference check results. Categories: entity references, API endpoint validity, design token consistency, section data requirements. Each result is pass/warning/error with description.

components.name: ExportActions
components.description: Export action bar with format selection (folder/zip), download button, and copy-to-clipboard for the sdp.json manifest. Shows estimated total package size.

components.name: ReadmePreview
components.description: Rendered preview of the generated README.md that will be included in the SDP. Shows product overview, section list, and quick-start guide for AI agents.

interactions.behavior: Show file preview in right panel
